cast.name: 卡桑德拉·李·莫里斯 Cassandra Lee Morris

this_title: Monster High: Adventures of the Ghoul Squad Season 1
trans_title: 精灵高中：食尸鬼小队的冒险 第一季
introduction: On August 11, 2017, Mattel Creations released an 11-minute 12-episode series on YouTube and YouTube Kids titled Monster High: Adventures of the Ghoul Squad which followed the second-generation reboot films.[19] The series also debuted on KidsClick in the United States along with Barbie: Dreamtopia, on September 24, 2018.
chinese_title: 精灵高中：食尸鬼小队的冒险 第一季
foreign_title: Monster High: Adventures of the Ghoul Squad Season 1
